inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of 8 weeks or more
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky or Lansky score of 50 or more
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: AST and ALT 1.5 x or less upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alk Phos level less than 2.5 x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine 2 x or less ULN or GFR 50 ml/min/1.73 m2 or more
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential must take/use effective birth control while participating in the study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women will be excluded from this research.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior allergic reaction to the study drugs used in this protocol or other drugs formulated with polysorbate 80.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known HIV positive subjects since treatment may be significantly immunosuppressive
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no positive history of drug allergy

exclusion.criterion: Patients, who in the opinion of the investigator, may not be able to comply with the safety monitoring requirements of the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He also had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
